greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number T(n,k) of colored set partitions of [n] where exactly k colors are used for the elements; triangle T(n,k), n>=0, 0<=k<=n, read by rows.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..140, flattened
maple: A:= proc(n, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, add(
T:= (n, k)-> add(A(n, k-i)*(-1)^i*binomial(k, i), i=0..k):
mathematica: A[n_, k_] := A[n, k] = If[n==0, 1, Sum[A[n-j, k] Binomial[n-1, j-1] k^j, {j, 1, n}]];
T[n_, k_] := Sum[A[n, k - i] (-1)^i Binomial[k, i], {i, 0, k}];
T[n_, k_] := BellB[n] StirlingS2[n, k] k!;
Table[Table[T[n, k], {k, 0, n}], {n, 0, 10}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 08 2020, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
xref: Columns k=0-1 give: A000007, A000110 (for n>0).
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 30 2019
